com.wolvencraft.yasp.db.data.hooks

Interface _PluginHook

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    VaultHook, WorldGuardHook

    public interface _PluginHook
    Common interface for plugin hook data stores
    Author:
    bitWolfy

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  _PluginHook.PluginHookEntry 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cleanup()
      Makes sure that there are no loose ends.
      boolean patch()
      Patches the database to the latest version of the corresponding plugin

    • Method Detail

      • patch

        boolean patch()
        Patches the database to the latest version of the corresponding plugin
        Returns:
        true if the database was brought to date, false if an error occurred

      • cleanup

        void cleanup()
        Makes sure that there are no loose ends. Breaks the connection to the parent plugin if need be.
